name: Sneaky Ways
description:
Top down racing from the 16 bit age!  Sneaky Ways is an arcade racer with a graphical style and gameplay reminiscent of top down racers from the Amiga and Sega Genesis.

Enjoy four environments with plenty of shortcuts and sneaky ways to reach the finish line ahead of the other nine AI drivers.

-----------------------------------------

Driverless cars...an emerging technology that held so much promise.

Testing began in the desert where the self driving machines were pushed to their extremes.  Combat systems were added.  The technology became weaponised.

Their final test is a race against you......the reigning Formula champion.

You must face off against the driverless cars in four challenging locations.

Do you have what it takes to win the race against the machines?
